```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse",dependencies = TRUE)
install.packages("ggpubr",dependencies = TRUE)
install.packages("rstatix",dependencies = TRUE)
install.packages("afex",dependencies = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)
library(afex)

```

```{r}
install.packages("nparMD",dependencies = TRUE)
library(nparMD)
install.packages("nparACT",dependencies = TRUE)
library(nparACT)
install.packages("WRS2",dependencies = TRUE)
library(WRS2)
```

```{r}
article <- read.csv("ArticleExperimentData.csv")
head(article)

numpad <- read.csv("NumpadExperimentData.csv")
head(numpad)

weather <- read.csv("WeatherExperimentData.csv")
weather = subset(weather, select = -c(Time_To_First_Guess))
head(weather)
```

![]()

```{r}
long_data <- rbind(article, numpad, weather)
long_data
```

![]()

```{r}
balanced_long_data <- subset(long_data, userID!= 85)
balanced_long_data <- subset(balanced_long_data, userID!= 56)
head(balanced_long_data)

```

```{r}
bxp <- ggboxplot(
  balanced_long_data, x = "Application", y = "Time",
  color = "Mode", palette = "jco"
  )
bxp
```

```{r}
outliers <- balanced_long_data %>% group_by(Application, Mode) %>% identify_outliers(Time)
outliers
```

```{r}
balanced_long_data %>%
  group_by(Application, Mode) %>%
  shapiro_test(Time)
```

```{r}
ggqqplot(balanced_long_data, "Time", ggtheme = theme_bw()) +
  facet_grid(Application ~ Mode)
```

```{r}
balanced_long_data %>%
  group_by(Application) %>%
  levene_test(Time ~ Mode)
```

```{r}
box_m(balanced_long_data[, "Time", drop = FALSE], balanced_long_data$Application)
```

![]()

```{r}
mixed_anova <- aov_ez(
  id = "userID",
  dv = "Time",
  data = balanced_long_data,
  between = "Mode",
  within = "Application"
)
mixed_anova
```

```{r}
res.aov <- anova_test(
  data = balanced_long_data, dv = Time, wid = userID,
  between = Mode, within = Application
  )
get_anova_table(res.aov)
```

```{r}
one.way <- balanced_long_data %>%
  group_by(Application) %>%
  anova_test(dv = Time, wid = userID, between = Mode) %>%
  get_anova_table() %>%
  adjust_pvalue(method = "bonferroni")
one.way
```

```{r}
pwc <- balanced_long_data %>%
  group_by(Application) %>%
  pairwise_t_test(Time ~ Mode, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
pwc
```

```{r}
one.way2 <- balanced_long_data %>%
  group_by(Application) %>%
  anova_test(dv = Time, wid = userID, between = Mode) %>%
  get_anova_table() %>%
  adjust_pvalue(method = "bonferroni")
one.way2
```
